reviews.subject: Biology
reviews.review: Dr. Johnson's lectures are engaging and informative. She always makes time for students' questions.

reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: Brilliant professor! His explanations of complex algorithms are crystal clear.

reviews.subject: Psychology
reviews.review: Interesting course material, but the workload can be overwhelming at times.

reviews.subject: History
reviews.review: Prof. Martinez brings history to life with his passionate storytelling.

reviews.subject: Chemistry
reviews.review: Exceptional teacher! Her lab demonstrations are both educational and entertaining.

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews.review: Lectures can be dry, and the exams are much harder than the coursework.

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.review: Thought-provoking discussions in every class. Dr. Davis challenges students to think critically.

reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: Knowledgeable, but sometimes struggles to explain concepts to non-physics majors.

reviews.subject: Literature
reviews.review: Dr. Rodriguez's passion for literature is contagious. Her class is a joy to attend.

reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews.review: Clear explanations and always willing to help during office hours.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.review: Dr. Brown's lectures are like guided tours through art museums. Absolutely fascinating!

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: Interesting course content, but discussions can sometimes get off-topic.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Dr. Green's field trips make learning about ecosystems a hands-on experience.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: Mind-bending lectures that challenge your perspective on life and existence.

reviews.subject: Neuroscience
reviews.review: Complex subject made accessible through Dr. Patel's clear teaching style.

reviews.subject: Business Administration
reviews.review: Relies too heavily on group projects. Lectures don't add much value beyond the textbook.

reviews.subject: Linguistics
reviews.review: Dr. Taylor's enthusiasm for language is infectious. Best class I've taken in college!

reviews.subject: Engineering
reviews.review: Knowledgeable but strict. Be prepared for challenging problem sets and exams.

reviews.subject: Anthropology
reviews.review: Fascinating lectures on human cultures. Dr. Adams encourages critical thinking and open discussions.

reviews.subject: Music Theory
reviews.review: Prof. Lewis makes complex musical concepts accessible and fun to learn. Highly recommended!
